Posts.Content: I do not believe we have had that same problem on the colo-rectal site, I browse both as my daughter and I have breast cancer and my husband has colon. We get very helpful, "friendly" advice that we always take back to our onco's to discuss. That is what makes America great. As long as your friend is not advocating a magic potion that convinces someone to give up all other avenues I say go for it and this American Cancer Society site should say the same. Lou
Posts.Title: Need to know something...
